item.title: 亚洲股市震荡，因华尔街抛售削弱市场信心
item.description: 亚洲股市周二早盘震荡，因隔夜华尔街抛售令投资者感到不安，特朗普关税政策的不确定性加剧以及地缘政治紧张局势升级，均打击了市场情绪。【原文：Asian stock markets stuttered in early trade on Tuesday as a selloff on Wall Street overnight rattled investors, with sentiment hurt by heightened uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policy and rising geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，埃利奥特正游说股东支持收购丰田工业
item.description: 知情人士透露，埃利奥特管理公司已提出以接近市场价格收购丰田工业股份，对象是那些同意其要约收购的股东。这家美国激进投资机构认为，当前股价低估了这家叉车制造商的价值。【原文：Elliott Management has offered to pay around market price to buy Toyota Industries shares from holders who have agreed to a tender offer that the U.S. activist said undervalues the forklift truck maker, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 独家：中国DeepSeek在美禁令下仍用英伟达顶级芯片训练AI模型，官方证实
item.description: 特朗普政府一位高级官员周一表示，中国人工智能初创企业DeepSeek即将于下周发布的最新人工智能模型，是在英伟达最先进的人工智能芯片Blackwell上训练完成的。此举可能违反美国出口管制规定。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek's latest AI model, set to be released as soon as next week, was trained on Nvidia's most advanced AI chip, the Blackwell, a senior Trump administration official said on Monday, in what could represent a violation of U.S. export controls.】

item.title: 摩根大通的戴蒙表示他将继续担任首席执行官数年
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米·戴蒙周一表示，他将继续掌舵这家美国最大银行"几年"。【原文：JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon said on Monday he will remain at the helm of the largest U.S. bank for a "few years."】

item.title: 特朗普支持的加密稳定币遭"攻击"后下跌，迅速回升
item.description: 特朗普家族支持的加密稳定币USD1周一短暂跌破1美元基准价，至约0.994美元，但随后迅速回升。【原文：The Trump family-backed crypto stablecoin, USD1, briefly dipped below its $1 benchmark price on Monday, to around $0.994, but quickly recovered.】

item.title: 《华尔街日报》报道称，特朗普考虑在最高法院裁决后实施新的国家安全关税
item.description: 《华尔街日报》周一报道称，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普政府正考虑对六个行业征收新的国家安全关税，此前最高法院上周作出裁决，宣布其第二任期内实施的许多关税措施无效。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is considering new national security tariffs on a half-dozen industries after a Supreme Court decision last week that invalidated many of his second-term levies, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 联邦快递起诉美国政府要求退还特朗普紧急关税
item.description: 全球运输公司联邦快递周一在美国国际贸易法院提起诉讼，要求退还特朗普总统实施的紧急关税。上周美国最高法院裁定这些关税非法。【原文：Global transportation company FedEx on Monday filed a lawsuit in the U.S. Court of International Trade seeking a refund for President Donald Trump's emergency tariffs, which the U.S. Supreme Court deemed illegal last week.】

item.title: 众议院民主党人称，搁置对华行动损害美国国家安全
item.description: 美国众议院民主党人周一表示，特朗普政府暂停针对北京的关键科技安全措施的"令人不安"决定，为稳定中美关系而危及美国国家安全。【原文：The Trump administration's "troubling" decision to pause key tech security measures aimed at Beijing jeopardizes U.S. national security in the interest of steadying relations with China, Democrats in the U.S. House of Representatives said on Monday.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构批准代币化WisdomTree货币市场基金的日内交易
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周一表示，已批准资产管理公司WisdomTree的特别申请，允许对货币市场基金的代币化股份进行日内交易。该机构称此举可加快结算时间，并为散户投资者提供更便捷的投资渠道。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday said it had granted a special request from the asset manager WisdomTree to allow intraday trading in tokenized shares of a money market fund, adding that this could speed settlement times and ease access for retail investors.】

item.title: 风暴导致交通瘫痪，造成美国8000多架次航班受影响
item.description: 美国航空公司仍在努力应对一场席卷东北部的强劲冬季风暴，这场风暴已导致周一超过8000个航班取消或延误，周二还有数千个航班被取消。【原文：U.S. airlines were still digging out from a powerful Northeast winter storm that forced more than 8,000 flight cancellations and delays on Monday, with thousands more already scrubbed for Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：特朗普关税乱局重创美股
item.description: 周一华尔街股市大幅下挫，全球关税不确定性再度升温，加之软件驱动的人工智能引发的担忧持续发酵，令股市承压，投资者纷纷涌向黄金、美国国债和瑞士法郎等传统避险资产。【原文：Wall Street fell sharply on Monday as renewed global tariff uncertainty and rumbling software-fueled AI fears slammed shares and steered investors to the traditional safe-haven harbors of gold, Treasuries and the Swiss franc.】

item.title: 消息人士称，派拉蒙提交更高报价竞购华纳兄弟探索公司，旨在阻挠奈飞收购计划
item.description: 知情人士周一向路透社透露，派拉蒙与天空舞动公司已对华纳兄弟探索公司提交更高报价，加大力度试图阻挠这家HBO Max所有者与奈飞的交易。【原文：Paramount Skydance submitted a higher offer for Warner Bros Discovery , a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday, ratcheting up efforts to derail the HBO Max owner's deal with Netflix.】

item.title: 美国参议院民主党人提出法案，要求退还被认定为非法的特朗普关税
item.description: 美国参议院22名民主党议员周一提出一项法案，要求特朗普政府在180天内全额退还因被美国最高法院裁定无效的关税所征收的所有收入及利息。【原文：A group of 22 U.S. Senate Democrats on Monday introduced legislation that would require President Donald Trump's administration to fully refund within 180 days all of the revenue, with interest, collected from tariffs struck down by the U.S. Supreme Court.】

item.title: 花旗签署协议出售Banamex 24%股权
item.description: 花旗集团周一宣布，已达成协议将Banamex银行24%的股权出售给一组机构投资者和家族办公室，交易金额约为25亿美元。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday it had entered into agreements to sell a 24% stake in Banamex to a group of institutional investors and family offices for around $2.5 billion.】

item.title: 是德科技预测季度利润将超预期，主要得益于数据中心驱动的强劲需求
item.description: 电子设备制造商是德科技周一公布的第二季度盈利超出华尔街预期，其股价在盘后交易中上涨逾15%。【原文：Electronic equipment maker Keysight Technologies forecast second-quarter profit ahead of Wall Street estimates on Monday, sending its shares up more than 15% in after-market trading.】

item.title: 巴西杰尔道公司第四季度经调整净利润小幅增长
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商杰达公司周一公布，其第四季度经调整净利润较上年同期增长0.5%，达6.7亿雷亚尔（约合1.2972亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Gerdau on Monday reported a 0.5% increase in its fourth-quarter adjusted net profit to 670 million reais ($129.72 million) compared to a year earlier.】

item.title: 摩根大通维持成本目标，力争实现17%的有形股权回报率
item.description: 摩根大通维持全年调整后支出预测不变，仍为1050亿美元，并表示其目标是实现17%的有形普通股权益回报率。【原文：JPMorgan Chase kept its forecast for annual adjusted expenses unchanged at $105 billion and said it targets 17% return on tangible common equity.】

item.title: Hims & Hers预测2026年营收将超预期
item.description: Hims & Hers Health周一预测2026年营收将超出预期，押注其个性化医疗服务将实现销售增长。【原文：Hims & Hers Health forecast 2026 revenue above estimates on Monday, betting on increased sales for its personalized healthcare offerings.】

item.title: CrowdStrike、Datadog等网络安全股在Anthropic推出AI工具后下跌
item.description: 周一，包括CrowdStrike和Datadog在内的多家网络安全公司股价下跌，投资者正评估人工智能初创公司Anthropic推出的新型安全工具可能对该行业产生的影响。【原文：Shares of cybersecurity companies including CrowdStrike and Datadog slumped on Monday, as investors weighed the potential impact of artificial intelligence startup Anthropic's new security tool on the industry.】

item.title: 长寿专家彼得·阿提亚因爱泼斯坦邮件事件退出CBS新闻
item.description: CBS新闻发言人表示，这位长寿专家已辞去该媒体撰稿人职务，此前约三周其与一名性犯罪者的邮件往来被公开。【原文：The longevity expert has stepped aside as a contributor to CBS News, a network spokesperson said, roughly three weeks after his emails with the convicted sex offender became public.】

item.title: Crypto.com获得美国国家信托银行执照的附条件批准
item.description: 加密货币平台Crypto.com周一宣布，已获得美国货币监理署对全国性信托银行执照的附条件批准，这为该数字资产公司成为受联邦监管的托管机构铺平了道路。【原文：Crypto.com said on Monday it has received conditional approval from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency for a national trust bank charter, paving the way for the digital assets firm to become a federally regulated custodian.】

item.title: 美国反垄断执法机构将修订关于竞争对手合作的指导方针
item.description: 美国司法部和联邦贸易委员会将启动一项公开调查，为企业制定关于与竞争对手合作时法律边界的最新指导方针。司法部一位高级官员周一向记者透露了这一消息。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice and Federal Trade Commission will open a public inquiry to inform new guidelines for businesses on the bounds of the law when it comes to collaborating with competitors, a senior DOJ official told reporters on Monday.】

item.title: 巴拿马正式废除和和记黄埔的合约，将运河港口移交马士基
item.description: 巴拿马周一在其官方公报上公布了最高法院的一项裁决，取消了和记黄埔旗下子公司持有的关键港口合同，为马士基旗下的APM码头公司临时接管铺平了道路。【原文：Panama on Monday published in its official gazette a Supreme Court ruling canceling key port contracts held by a subsidiary of CK Hutchison , clearing the way for Maersk's APM Terminals to take over temporarily.】

item.title: 晨星与DBRS警示：随着评级下调增多，私募信贷质量持续恶化
item.description: 评级机构晨星DBRS指出，今年私人信贷质量持续恶化，2月份评级下调比例创下新高。【原文：Quality in private credit has continued to worsen this year, according to rating agency Morningstar DBRS, as the proportion of downgrades reached a new high in February.】

item.title: 美国设备租赁与融资协会称，1月份美国企业设备贷款额增长逾30%
item.description: 美国设备租赁与金融协会周一表示，今年1月美国企业为购买设备融资的借款额较去年同期增长30.1%，达到近二十年来最高水平。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 30.1% more to finance equipment purchases in January than a year earlier, reaching the highest dollar amount in the last two decades, the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association said on Monday.】

item.title: 亚马逊计划斥资120亿美元在路易斯安那州扩建数据中心
item.description: 亚马逊表示，计划向路易斯安那州投资120亿美元，作为在该州建设数据中心计划的一部分。【原文：Amazon said it plans to invest $12 billion in Louisiana as part of a plan to build data centers in the Pelican State.】

item.title: 加拿大紧急召集OpenAI安全团队赴渥太华进行磋商
item.description: 加拿大人工智能部长埃文·所罗门周一告诉记者，在发现OpenAI公司未就某位后来实施校园枪击案的嫌疑人分享内部担忧后，加拿大已紧急召见该公司高管赴渥太华进行磋商。【原文：Canada has summoned top officials from OpenAI to Ottawa for urgent talks after it emerged the company had not shared internal concerns about a person who went on to commit a school shooting, Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon told reporters on Monday.】

item.title: C.H.罗宾逊首席执行官表示人工智能将推动货运经纪行业整合
item.description: 全球物流服务商C.H.罗宾逊公司首席执行官戴夫·博兹曼驳斥了近期因人工智能引发的货运行业动荡所导致的抛售潮，并表示技术应用竞赛反而会推动行业整合。【原文：Global logistics provider C.H. Robinson's CEO Dave Bozeman dismissed a recent selloff tied to AI-led disruption in the freight industry, and said the race to adopt the technology would spur consolidation instead.】

item.title: Anthropic称中国公司利用Claude改进自家模型
item.description: 聊天机器人克劳德的开发公司Anthropic周一在博客中称，三家中国公司曾试图利用克劳德不当获取能力以改进其自身模型。【原文：Three Chinese companies have tried to use Claude to improperly obtain capabilities to improve their own models, the chatbot's creator Anthropic said in a blog post on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约联储通胀指标12月升温
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的指标，12月份潜在通胀水平升温，这表明要使整体价格压力回归美国央行2%的目标仍面临更多挑战。【原文：The underlying level of inflation heated up in December as measured by a New York Federal Reserve gauge, suggesting further challenges in getting overall price pressures back to the U.S. central bank's 2% target.】
